#include<stdio.h>
#include<string.h>
#include<cmath>
int main()
{
    int test_cases,num;
    scanf("%d",&test_cases);
    char sol[test_cases][7];
    for(int i=0;i<test_cases;i++)
    {
        scanf("%d",&num);
        if(pow(2,(int)log2(num))==num)
            strcpy(sol[i],"BKUL");
        else
            strcpy(sol[i],"BMEENA");
    }
    for(int i=0;i<test_cases;i++)
        printf("%s\n",sol[i]);
}
